Articles.Content: When I begin a new game I give my game saves the title of my project or a project category and I tend to keep quite a few, often I jump into a Hangar and wonder which game save am I in, my question would be is there a quick reference to know which game save you are in without having to exit the Hangar? If not it would be nice to see the title of the Game Save inside the Hangar or in a Drop List with the current Hangar Highlighted.
You can change your flag to a different one for each save. You can see the flags on the walls of the hangars so you can tell which save you are in.

2 minutes ago, worir4 said:

You can change your flag to a different one for each save. You can see the flags on the walls of the hangars so you can tell which save you are in.

This is one way that works nicely! Thank you!
